I already have liquid sourdough starter can I use this to liven it up?

Yes, you can definitely use this dried sourdough (Lev'Blé bio) to liven up your liquid sourdough starter. It's a dehydrated wheat-based sourdough, ideal for bread and leavened dough.

### How to use it:
- Mix a small amount (around 1 tablespoon) of this dried sourdough into your existing liquid starter.
- Add some fresh flour and water to feed your starter and mix thoroughly.
- Let it ferment at room temperature (around 20–24°C or 68–75°F) for 6-12 hours or until bubbly and active.

This will reinvigorate your starter by introducing new active cultures and enhancing fermentation.
